name: Villain REWIND (RedstoneEngine)
description:
Villain REWIND

This project is in development on my YouTube Channel!

Check out the latest DevLog here! (1:21 for Villain REWIND)

Donate to Team Seas:

1$ -> 1 lb of Trash Removed from the Ocean

-> TeamSeas.org <-

Story:

You were just able to get past all the previous rooms with your life! You had to stop Villain REWIND before he obtains the time crystals, but it seems it's too late! You now must repeat the same room over and over, rewinding each time. Only problem is, you're in his domain now. He can shape the room to whatever he wishes. With the knowledge of your previous moves, this can't be good. He aims to build a bomb strong enough to destroy the world. You must stop him in the times that remain!

Game Info:

Challenge yourself with this 3D platformer themed around the word REWIND. Beat the Villain REWIND over and over with a dynamically changing level based off of your previous paths. I'll give you a slight advantage! A disable-gun able to disable any traps with a slow recharge. Good luck.

Controls:

WASDMoveMouseRotate CameraSpaceJumpLeft-Shift & WASDSlideLeft-ClickShoot "Disability Pellet"EscapePause

Try out the Original Unity Version here: Villain REWIND - Unity Demo

This Game is currently in development so not all features promised are in or fully developed yet! :)
